liquibase.change.AbstractChange

liquibase.change.AbstractChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.AbstractChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Standard superclass for Changes to implement.

This is a skeletal implementation, as defined in Effective Java#16.

See also:
Change
